languages.text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что Мессия мертв? Истинно ли утверждение, что схизме положен конец?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
languages.original_text: "Запрашиваем ответ — истинно ли утверждение, что Мессия мертв? Истинно ли утверждение, что схизме положен конец?"

traits.locale_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
"Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

languages.text: “进行询问。弥赛亚已经死了，这种说法是真的吗？分裂已经结束，这种说法是真的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

traits.locale_text: “进行询问。弥赛亚已经死了，这种说法是真的吗？分裂已经结束，这种说法是真的吗？”

languages.text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle le messie est mort est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle le schisme a pris fin est-elle vraie ? »
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

traits.locale_text: « Question. L'affirmation selon laquelle le messie est mort est-elle vraie ? L'affirmation selon laquelle le schisme a pris fin est-elle vraie ? »

languages.text: «Pregunta: ¿Es verdad que el mesías ha muerto? ¿Es verdad que el cisma ha terminado?».
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

traits.locale_text: «Pregunta: ¿Es verdad que el mesías ha muerto? ¿Es verdad que el cisma ha terminado?».

languages.text: 「質問だ。救世主は死んだという発言は真実なのか？分断は終結したという発言は本当か？」
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

traits.locale_text: 「質問だ。救世主は死んだという発言は真実なのか？分断は終結したという発言は本当か？」

languages.text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass der Messias tot ist? Stimmt die Aussage, dass die Spaltung beendet wurde?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage. Stimmt die Aussage, dass der Messias tot ist? Stimmt die Aussage, dass die Spaltung beendet wurde?"

languages.text: "Sual: Mesih'in öldüğü bilgisi doğru mu? Bölünmenin sona erdiği doğru mu?"
languages.original_text: "Query. Is the statement that the Messiah is dead true? Is the statement that the schism has been ended true?"
